title: TrustScore
description: Trust score summary for an entity in the Soz Ledger protocol.

entity_id.description: The entity this score belongs to.

overall_score.description: Composite trust score between 0 and 1, or null if the entity is unrated.

rated.description: Whether the entity has enough promise history to produce a meaningful score.

total_promises.description: Total number of promises associated with this entity.

avg_delay_hours.description: Average hours between deadline and actual fulfillment.

category_scores.description: Per-category trust scores, keyed by promise category.

score_version.description: Version identifier of the scoring algorithm used to compute this score.
